item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Stoop Coffee: How a Simple Idea Transformed My Neighborhood (261 points | 92 comments)
2. 4o Image Generation (123 points | 63 comments)
3. Kylie Minogue song about a typeface (73 points | 27 comments)
4. Gemini 2.5: Our most intelligent AI model (271 points | 145 comments)
5. The Ethics of Spreading Life in the Cosmos (11 points | 4 comments)
6. Deciphering language processing in the human brain through LLM representations (20 points | 2 comments)
7. VGGT: Visual Geometry Grounded Transformer (101 points | 30 comments)
8. Whose code am I running in GitHub Actions? (16 points | 5 comments)
9. Borne Back Ceaselessly into the Past: Fitzgerald, Gatsby and WWI (28 points | 6 comments)
10. Activeloop (YC S18) Is Hiring Senior Python Back End and AI Search Engineers ( | hide)
11. The Jakt Programming Language (60 points | 12 comments)
12. Were large soda lakes the cradle of life? (21 points | 8 comments)
13. Open-sourcing OpenPubkey SSH (OPKSSH): integrating single sign-on with SSH (72 points | 73 comments)
14. Why is C the symbol for the speed of light? (2004) (77 points | 55 comments)
15. Show HN: Feudle – a daily puzzle game built with AI (12 points | 3 comments)
16. Show HN: Fingernotes – handwritten notes which become their own preview image (7 points | 9 comments)
17. Polypane, The browser for ambitious web developers (129 points | 82 comments)
18. Scientists break down plastic using a simple, inexpensive catalyst and air (11 points | 3 comments)
19. How 'animal methods bias' is affecting research careers (14 points | discuss)
20. Search My Site – open-source search engine for personal and independent websites (234 points | 49 comments)
21. Hann: A Fast Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search Library for Go (56 points | 7 comments)
22. Reflecting on WikiTok (136 points | 33 comments)
23. U.S. national-security leaders included me in a group chat (1185 points | 383 comments)
24. A study reveals that deciduous trees' roots remain active in winter (61 points | 24 comments)
25. Bitcoin in the bush – the crypto mine in remote Zambia (21 points | 4 comments)
26. Writing your own C++ standard library from scratch (131 points | 101 comments)
27. German parliament votes as a Git contribution graph (558 points | 154 comments)
28. BBC – Organizing music for organic discovery (20 points | 3 comments)
29. Show HN: Generate docs from your public repos (7 points | discuss)
30. The Lost Towers of the Guelph-Ghibelline Wars (102 points | 31 comments)
